! Title: uBlock-Origin-dev-filter â€“ Google+DuckDuckGo â€“ seo_spam
! Expires: 1 day
! Description: Filters to block and remove copycat-websites from search engines. Specific to dev websites like StackOverflow or GitHub.
! Homepage: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter
! Licence: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter/blob/main/LICENSE
!
! GitHub issues: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter/issues
! GitHub pull requests: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter/pulls
||spiegato.com$all
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="spiegato.com"])
duckduckgo.com###links>div:has(a[href*="spiegato.com"])
||actingcollegeses.com$all
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="actingcollegeses.com"])
duckduckgo.com###links>div:has(a[href*="actingcollegeses.com"])
||patrickkidd3.typepad.com$all
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="patrickkidd3.typepad.com"])
duckduckgo.com###links>div:has(a[href*="patrickkidd3.typepad.com"])
